nodes.bodyText: oh yeah oops, I just needed it to confirm something.
Can we say // for local SNAPSHOT build/install/test? Unrelated to this PR, yesterday I couldn't figure out what this does and removed it in one of my branches.
you mean the maven-publish plugin? In other sub-projects we use it to generate the poms.
Can we add that this must be the first block in settings.gadle? https://docs.gradle.org/current/userguide/plugins.html#sec:plugin_management
